tool.name: NucleicAcidSearchEngine
tool.description: Annotate nucleic acid identifications to MS/MS spectra.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir database && ln -s '$database' 'database/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $database.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($database.ext)' && mkdir out && #if "id_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir id_out && #end if #if "lfq_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir lfq_out && #end if #if "theo_ms2_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir theo_ms2_out && #end if #if "exp_ms2_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir exp_ms2_out && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -database 'database/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $database.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($database.ext)' -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("mztab")}' #if "id_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -id_out 'id_out/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' #end if #if "lfq_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -lfq_out 'lfq_out/output.${gxy2omsext("tabular")}' #end if #if "theo_ms2_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -theo_ms2_out 'theo_ms2_out/output.${gxy2omsext("mzml")}' #end if #if "exp_ms2_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -exp_ms2_out 'exp_ms2_out/output.${gxy2omsext("mzml")}' #end if #if len(str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',')) == 0 | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("mztab")}' '$out' #if "id_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'id_out/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' '$id_out' #end if #if "lfq_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'lfq_out/output.${gxy2omsext("tabular")}' '$lfq_out' #end if #if "theo_ms2_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'theo_ms2_out/output.${gxy2omsext("mzml")}' '$theo_ms2_out' #end if #if "exp_ms2_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'exp_ms2_out/output.${gxy2omsext("mzml")}' '$exp_ms2_out' #end if #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: in
param.label: Input file: spectra

param.name: database
param.label: Input file: sequence database

param.name: mass_tolerance
param.label: Precursor mass tolerance (+/- around uncharged precursor mass)

param.name: mass_tolerance_unit
param.label: Unit of precursor mass tolerance

param.name: min_charge
param.label: Minimum precursor charge to be considered

param.name: max_charge
param.label: Maximum precursor charge to be considered

param.name: include_unknown_charge
param.label: Include MS2 spectra with unknown precursor charge - try to match them in any possible charge between 'min_charge' and 'max_charge', at the risk of a higher error rate

param.name: use_avg_mass
param.label: Use average instead of monoisotopic precursor masses (appropriate for low-resolution instruments)

param.name: use_adducts
param.label: Consider possible salt adducts (see 'precursor:potential_adducts') when matching precursor masses

param.name: potential_adducts
param.label: Adducts considered to explain mass differences
param.help: Format: 'Element:Charge(+/-)', i.e. the number of '+' or '-' indicates the charge, e.g. 'Ca:++' indicates +2. Only used if 'precursor:use_adducts' is set (space separated list, in order to allow for spaces in list items surround them by single quotes)

param.name: isotopes
param.label: Correct for mono-isotopic peak misassignments
param.help: E.g.: 1 = precursor may be misassigned to the first isotopic peak. Ignored if 'use_avg_mass' is set (space separated list, in order to allow for spaces in list items surround them by single quotes)

param.name: mass_tolerance
param.label: Fragment mass tolerance (+/- around fragment m/z)

param.name: mass_tolerance_unit
param.label: Unit of fragment mass tolerance

param.name: ions
param.label: Fragment ions to include in theoretical spectra

param.name: variable
param.label: Variable modifications

param.name: variable_max_per_oligo
param.label: Maximum number of residues carrying a variable modification per candidate oligonucleotide

param.name: resolve_ambiguities
param.label: Attempt to resolve ambiguous modifications
param.help: (e.g. 'mA?' for 'mA'/'Am') based on a-B ions.. This incurs a performance cost because two modifications have to be considered for each case.. Requires a-B ions to be enabled in parameter 'fragment:ions'

param.name: min_size
param.label: Minimum size an oligonucleotide must have after digestion to be considered in the search

param.name: max_size
param.label: Maximum size an oligonucleotide must have after digestion to be considered in the search, leave at 0 for no limit

param.name: missed_cleavages
param.label: Number of missed cleavages

param.name: enzyme
param.label: The enzyme used for RNA digestion

param.name: top_hits
param.label: Maximum number of top-scoring hits per spectrum that are reported ('0' for all hits)

param.name: decoy_pattern
param.label: String used as part of the accession to annotate decoy sequences
param.help: (e.g. 'DECOY_'). Leave empty to skip the FDR/q-value calculation

param.name: cutoff
param.label: Cut-off for FDR filtering; search hits with higher q-values will be removed

param.name: remove_decoys
param.label: Do not score hits to decoy sequences and remove them when filtering

param.name: decharge_ms2
param.label: Decharge the MS2 spectra for scoring

param.name: force
param.label: Overrides tool-specific checks

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

param.name: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS
param.label: Optional outputs
param.option: id_out (Output file: idXML (for visualization in TOPPView))
lfq_out (Output file: Targets for label-free quantification using FeatureFinderMetaboIdent ('id' input))
theo_ms2_out (Output file: theoretical MS2 spectra for precursor mass matches)
exp_ms2_out (Output file: experimental MS2 spectra for precursor mass matches)

data.name: id_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: id_out
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "id_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: lfq_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: lfq_out
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "lfq_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: theo_ms2_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: theo_ms2_out
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "theo_ms2_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: exp_ms2_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: exp_ms2_out
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "exp_ms2_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Annotate nucleic acid identifications to MS/MS spectra.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/doxygen/release/2.6.0/html/UTILS_NucleicAcidSearchEngine.html
